languages.text: Навигатор бесстрашно ведет корабль в аномалию, и вскоре из нее возвращаются все поглощенные суда. Аномалия исчезает, выпустив корабль Ханна последним: его экипаж постарел на десятки лет. Одряхлевший навигатор не узнает прежних знакомых и тихо доживает свои дни в медотсеке, так ничего и не рассказав о пережитом.

The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.
languages.original_text: Навигатор бесстрашно ведет корабль в аномалию, и вскоре из нее возвращаются все поглощенные суда. Аномалия исчезает, выпустив корабль Ханна последним: его экипаж постарел на десятки лет. Одряхлевший навигатор не узнает прежних знакомых и тихо доживает свои дни в медотсеке, так ничего и не рассказав о пережитом.

traits.locale_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew now decades older. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility without ever getting a chance to tell what transpired inside the anomaly.
The Navigator requests to visit the area personally, where he successfully seals the warp breach — at the cost of his life.

languages.text: Le navigateur intrépide guide son vaisseau droit sur l'anomalie, d'où ressurgissent bientôt tous les bâtiments préalablement engloutis. L'anomalie se dissipe après avoir recraché le vaisseau de Hann, dont l'équipage a vieilli entre-temps de plusieurs décennies. Réduit à l'état de vieillard décrépit, le navigateur ne reconnaît plus son entourage et termine ses vieux jours à l'infirmerie du bord, emportant avec lui les secrets de cet étrange phénomène.
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.

traits.locale_text: Le navigateur intrépide guide son vaisseau droit sur l'anomalie, d'où ressurgissent bientôt tous les bâtiments préalablement engloutis. L'anomalie se dissipe après avoir recraché le vaisseau de Hann, dont l'équipage a vieilli entre-temps de plusieurs décennies. Réduit à l'état de vieillard décrépit, le navigateur ne reconnaît plus son entourage et termine ses vieux jours à l'infirmerie du bord, emportant avec lui les secrets de cet étrange phénomène.

languages.text: 航宙士は大胆不敵にも船を直接特異点へと導いた。飲み込まれていたすべての船が特異点から姿を現し始める。数十年分年老いたクルーとともに、ハンの船が最後に解放され、特異点は消滅した。老いさらばえた航宙士は、もはや見知った顔も見分けられず、船内の医療施設で静かに日々を過ごしている。アノマリー内部で何が起こったのかは決して明かさないままに。
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は大胆不敵にも船を直接特異点へと導いた。飲み込まれていたすべての船が特異点から姿を現し始める。数十年分年老いたクルーとともに、ハンの船が最後に解放され、特異点は消滅した。老いさらばえた航宙士は、もはや見知った顔も見分けられず、船内の医療施設で静かに日々を過ごしている。アノマリー内部で何が起こったのかは決して明かさないままに。

languages.text: 汉恩引导着他的舰船，毫不畏惧地冲进了异常区域。很快，所有被异常区域吞噬的舰船被放了出来，而在那之后，异常区域就消失了。汉恩的船是最后一艘出来的，所有船员都变老了几十岁。如今，导航者汉恩已经老态龙钟，再也认不出熟悉的面孔。他待在船上的医疗设施里，静静地安度余生，没有向任何人透露异常区域内部究竟发生了什么。
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.

traits.locale_text: 汉恩引导着他的舰船，毫不畏惧地冲进了异常区域。很快，所有被异常区域吞噬的舰船被放了出来，而在那之后，异常区域就消失了。汉恩的船是最后一艘出来的，所有船员都变老了几十岁。如今，导航者汉恩已经老态龙钟，再也认不出熟悉的面孔。他待在船上的医疗设施里，静静地安度余生，没有向任何人透露异常区域内部究竟发生了什么。

languages.text: El Navegante guía valientemente su nave hacia la anomalía, y pronto todas otras naves que habían sido devoradas empiezan a emerger del interior. La anomalía se disipa, soltando en último lugar la nave de Hann, cuya tripulación ha envejecido varias décadas. Convertido en un anciano decrépito, el Navegante no puede reconocer a nadie y termina sus días en la instalación medicae, sin contar nunca lo que sucedió en esa anomalía.
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.

traits.locale_text: El Navegante guía valientemente su nave hacia la anomalía, y pronto todas otras naves que habían sido devoradas empiezan a emerger del interior. La anomalía se disipa, soltando en último lugar la nave de Hann, cuya tripulación ha envejecido varias décadas. Convertido en un anciano decrépito, el Navegante no puede reconocer a nadie y termina sus días en la instalación medicae, sin contar nunca lo que sucedió en esa anomalía.

languages.text: Der Navigator führt sein Schiff furchtlos geradewegs in die Anomalie. Bald darauf tauchen alle verschlungenen Schiffe wieder daraus auf. Die Anomalie löst sich auf. Hanns Schiff erscheint als letztes, seine Crew um Jahrzehnte gealtert. Der Navigator ist nun ein gebrechlicher alter Mann. Er erkennt vertraute Gesichter nicht mehr und verbringt seinen Lebensabend auf der Medicae-Station des Schiffs, ohne je darüber zu sprechen, was in der Anomalie geschehen ist.
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.

traits.locale_text: Der Navigator führt sein Schiff furchtlos geradewegs in die Anomalie. Bald darauf tauchen alle verschlungenen Schiffe wieder daraus auf. Die Anomalie löst sich auf. Hanns Schiff erscheint als letztes, seine Crew um Jahrzehnte gealtert. Der Navigator ist nun ein gebrechlicher alter Mann. Er erkennt vertraute Gesichter nicht mehr und verbringt seinen Lebensabend auf der Medicae-Station des Schiffs, ohne je darüber zu sprechen, was in der Anomalie geschehen ist.

languages.text: Rotacı, gözünü karartıp gemisini doğrudan anomaliye sürüyor ve kısa süre sonra yutulan tüm gemiler dışarı kusuluyor. Anomali, en son Hann'ın gemisini, içindeki mürettebatın ömründen çağlar çalınmış bir hâlde bırakarak yok oluyor. Artık çökmüş bir ihtiyar olan Rotacı, tanıdık simaları hatırlamıyor ve anomalinin içinde ne yaşandığını asla açıklamadan, günlerini sessizce geminin sıhhiye tesisinde geçiriyor.
languages.original_text: The Navigator fearlessly guides his ship directly into the anomaly, and soon all consumed vessels begin to emerge from it. The anomaly dissipates, releasing Hann's ship last, its crew aged by decades. Now a decrepit old man, the Navigator no longer recognises familiar faces and quietly lives out his days in the ship's medicae facility, never divulging what transpired inside the anomaly.
